#VAR var kindEncounter = npc.hasPersonalityTrait(PERSONALITY_TRAIT_KIND); var playerEnforcer = npc.hasFlag(NPC_FLAG_thinksPlayerEnforcer); var playerDemon = npc.hasFlag(NPC_FLAG_knowsPlayerDemon); var playerEscaped = npc.hasFlag(NPC_FLAG_playerEscapedLastCombat); var foughtPlayer = npc.hasFoughtPlayer(); var canal = npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_ALLEYS_CANAL_CROSSING) || npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_CANAL) || npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_CANAL_END); #ENDVAR

#IF(canal) #IF(!game.isDayTime()) As you [pc.walk] down the side of the dark canal, you suddenly see the light of an arcane-powered flashlight shining out from around a bend in the waterway up ahead. #ELSE As you [pc.walk] down the side of the canal, you suddenly hear a pair of voices drawing louder from around a bend in the waterway up ahead. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF(!game.isDayTime()) As you [pc.walk] down the dark alleyway, you suddenly see the light of an arcane-powered flashlight shining out from around the next corner. #ELSE As you [pc.walk] down the narrow alleyway, you suddenly hear a pair of voices drawing louder from around the next corner. #ENDIF #ENDIF #IF(playerEscaped) Preparing yourself for the worst, you get ready to defend yourself, and sure enough, as you recognise the two Enforcers who step around the corner as [npc.name] and [npc2.name], you realise that you're about to be attacked. #ELSE Preparing yourself for the worst, you get ready to defend yourself, but as you recognise the two Enforcers who step around the corner as [npc.name] and [npc2.name], you realise that this encounter might not involve any hostilities. #ENDIF

#IF(playerEscaped)

[npc.speech(Hey! It's you again!)] [npc.name] exclaims, [npc.speech(You won't escape from us this time!)]

[npc2.speech(You'll pay for attacking us before!)] [npc2.name] shouts as [npc2.she] draws [npc2.her] baton and rushes forwards to assist [npc2.her] superior in attempting to take you down.

It looks as though you're going to have to either defend yourself against these Enforcers, or choose to run away again...

#ELSEIF(foughtPlayer)

[npc.speech(Oh, it's you again,)] [npc.name] states as [npc.she] catches sight of you. Placing one hand on the baton at [npc.her] side, [npc.she] states, [npc.speech(You don't know how lucky you are to have had Lilaya come and rescue you; the typical punishment for resisting arrest and assaulting officers is slavery...)]

[npc2.speech(You'd better not try any of your bullshit again,)] [npc2.name] snarls, [npc2.speech(unless you're wanting us to give you another beating!)]

[npc.speech(We're not interested in dealing with someone related to an Elder Lilin, so unless you've got some criminal activity to report, then stay out of our way,)] [npc.name] says.

Knowing that you're under the protection of Lilaya, these two Enforcers clearly aren't interested in harassing you. You could simply continue on your way, or if you wanted to, you could always attempt to fight them again...

#ELSE #IF(playerEnforcer) #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_candi") > 0)

Upon seeing a familiar face, the two officers visibly relax, and [npc.name] greets you by saying, #IF(game.isDayTime()) [npc.speech(Ah, Constable [candi.surname]. Out for a stroll?)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Ah, Constable [candi.surname]. You're out here late. Taking a stroll?)] #ENDIF Putting on your best [candi.Name] impression, you affirm that you are.

[npc2.speech(Taking a break from vacuuming, I'm sure,)] the [npc2.name] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.race]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.race] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(You'll have to excuse [npc.herHim], we're still behind on our quota this week... If you could point out any nearby opportunities to us, it would really help us out.)] Once again mustering your acting ability, you tell the two officers you'll think about it.

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_claire") > 0)

Upon seeing a familiar face, the two officers visibly relax and briskly salute you. The [npc.name] greets you by saying, #IF(game.isDayTime()) [npc.speech(Ah, Sergeant [claire.surname], [pc.sir]. Out for a stroll up top?)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Ah, Sergeant [claire.surname], [pc.sir]. Out for a stroll up top? It's awfully late.)] #ENDIF Putting on your best [claire.Name] impression, you affirm that you are.

[npc2.speech(Must be nice to get proper breaks,)] the [npc2.race] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.race]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.race] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(You'll have to excuse [npc.herHim], we're still behind on our quota this week... If you could point out any nearby opportunities to us, it would really help us out.)] Once again mustering your acting ability, you tell the two officers you will.

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_brax") > 0)

Upon seeing a superior officer, the two officers visibly stiffen and give you a crisp salute. The [npc.race] greets you by saying, [npc.speech(Inspector [brax.surname], [pc.sir], everything is in order here.)] Putting on your best [brax.Name] impression, you tell the pair to be at ease.

[npc2.speech(Office must get stuffy with all that pussy,)] the [npc2.name] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.name]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.name] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(We'll be around if you need us, [pc.sir], just let us know.)]

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_wes") > 0)

Upon seeing a familiar face, the two officers visibly relax and briskly salute you. The [npc.name] greets you by saying, #IF(game.isDayTime()) [npc.speech(Ah, Quartermaster. Out for a stroll, [pc.sir]?)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Ah, Quartermaster. Taking a stroll, [pc.sir]? It's awfully late.)] #ENDIF Putting on your best [wes.Name] impression, you affirm that you are.

[npc2.speech(Didn't know [pc.she] was even capable of taking breaks,)] the [npc2.name] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.name]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.name] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(You'll have to excuse [npc.herHim], we're behind on our quota this week... if you could point out any nearby opportunities to us, it would really help us out.)] Once again mustering your acting ability, you tell the two officers you will.

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_elle") > 0)

Upon seeing a familiar face, the two officers visibly relax and briskly salute you. The [npc.name] greets you by saying, #IF(game.isDayTime()) [npc.speech(Ah, Quartermaster. Out for a stroll, [pc.sir]?)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Ah, Quartermaster. Taking a stroll, [pc.sir]? It's awfully late.)] #ENDIF Putting on your best [elle.Name] impression, you affirm that you are.

[npc2.speech(Armory must get real stuffy from all the fucking,)] the [npc2.name] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.name]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.name] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(You'll have to excuse [npc.herHim], we're behind on our quota this week... if you could point out any nearby opportunities to us, it would really help us out.)] Once again mustering your acting ability, you tell the two officers you will and take note of the names on their vests.

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_nysa") > 0)

Upon seeing a superior officer, the two officers visibly stiffen and give you a crisp salute. The [npc.name] greets you by saying, [npc.speech(Commissioner, [pc.sir], everything is in order here.)] Putting on your best Nysa impression, you tell the pair to be at ease.

[npc2.speech(Just our luck,)] the [npc2.name] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.name]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.name] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(We'll be around if you need us, [pc.sir], just let us know.)]

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_sean") > 0)

Upon seeing a familiar face, the two officers visibly relax, and the [npc.name] greets you by saying, #IF(game.isDayTime()) [npc.speech(Ah, Constable [sean.surname]. Out for a stroll?)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Ah, Constable [sean.surname]. You're out here late. Taking a stroll?)] #ENDIF Putting on your best [sean.Name] impression, you affirm that you are.

[npc2.speech(Probably trying to get into [candi.NamePos] pants again, I'm sure,)] the [npc2.name] mutters under [npc2.her] breath, promptly earning [npc2.her] a prod from the [npc.race]'s elbow.

Quickly changing the subject, the [npc.race] asks you for a favour, [npc.speech(You'll have to excuse [npc.herHim], we're still behind on our quota this week... If you could point out any nearby opportunities to us, it would really help us out.)] Once again mustering your acting ability, you tell the two officers you'll think about it.

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("uniform_passable") > 0)

[npc.speech(Oh, it's you again,)] the [npc.race] calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you, before quickly [npc.walking] over with [npc2.name] to stand right in front of you.

Seeing that you're wearing an Enforcer uniform, the two officers visibly relax, and [npc.name] asks, [npc.speech(Hey, if you've seen sign of any criminals nearby, then it'd be appreciated if you'd let us handle them; we're running behind on our quota this week...)]

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("uniform_passable") == 0)

Seeing that you're wearing an Enforcer uniform, the two officers visibly relax. [npc.Name] narrows [npc.her] eyes slightly at the state of your uniform and advises you, [npc.speech(Hey, I don't care much for the regs, but you better fix your uniform before sarge catches you. You know how it is, stickler for rules regardless of rank and all that.)] [npc2.Name], not sharing the same concern as [npc2.her] fellow officer asks, [npc2.speech(Oh yeah, if you've seen sign of any criminals nearby, then it'd be appreciated if you'd let us handle them; we're running behind on our quota this week...)]

#ELSE

Having seen you before in an Enforcer uniform, the two officers seem to still be treating you as though you're one of them, and [npc.name] asks, [npc.speech(Hey, if you've seen sign of any criminals nearby, then it'd be appreciated if you'd let us handle them; we're running behind on our quota this week...)]

#ENDIF #ELSEIF(pc.hasAnyEnforcerStatusEffect() && game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("uniform_passable") < 0)

[npc.speech(Oh, it's you again,)] the [npc.race] calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you, before quickly [npc.walking] over with [npc2.name] to stand right in front of you. A look of confusion briefly flashes across both officers' faces that quickly turns into barely-hidden anger.

#IF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_candi") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not Constable [candi.Surname]! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [candi.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_claire") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not Sergeant [claire.Surname]! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [claire.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_brax") == -2)

[npc.speech(Nice try, but Inspector [brax.Surname] is off the force. I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [brax.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_brax") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not Inspector [brax.Surname]! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [brax.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_wes") < -2)

[npc.speech(Nice try, but the Junior Quartermaster's had a career change. I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [wes.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_wes") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not our Quartermaster! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [wes.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_elle") < -2)

[npc.speech(Nice try, but we have a new Senior Quartermaster. I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on that stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_elle") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not our Quartermaster! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [elle.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_nysa") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not the Commissioner! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on her stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSEIF (game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong("impersonating_sean") < 0)

[npc.speech(Hey! You're not Constable [sean.Surname]! I don't know how your got your [pc.hands] on [sean.her] stuff, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ELSE

[npc.speech(You're not fooling anyone with that getup! I don't know where you got that equipment from, but you better hand it over, right now!)] [npc.name] snarls.

#ENDIF

[npc2.speech(Better make sure [pc.she] isn't hiding anything else either,)] [npc2.name] huffs.

[style.italicsBad(It seems your disguise didn't work and you now have two pissed off Enforcers to deal with.)]

#ELSE #IF(playerDemon)

[npc.speech(Oh, good [style.evening], [pc.maam],)] the [npc.race] calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you, before quickly [npc.walking] over with [npc2.name] to stand right in front of you.

Due to the fact that you're a demon, the two officers show you a great deal of respect, and they each stand to attention as [npc.name] explains, [npc.speech(We've had some more reports of criminal activity in this area, so if you've seen any suspicious characters nearby, then details on their whereabouts would be much appreciated.)]

#ELSEIF(pc.getRace()==RACE_HUMAN || !game.isDayTime())

[npc.speech(Oh, it's you again,)] the [npc.race] calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you, before quickly [npc.walking] over with [npc2.name] to stand right in front of you.

#IF(kindEncounter)

While [npc.she] clearly doesn't trust you to be on the right side of the law, [npc.name] tries to treat you in a kind manner as [npc.she] explains, [npc.speech(We're continuing to receive reports of criminal activity in this area, #IF(pc.getRace()==RACE_HUMAN) and as you're a human, #ELSE and as you're skulking around in the dark, #ENDIF we can't simply let you continue on your way without at least being searched. I'm going to have to ask that you turn around and face the wall so that we can give you a pat-down.)]

#ELSE

Throwing you a suspicious glare, [npc.name] puts [npc.her] hand on the baton that's holstered at [npc.her] side, and in a commanding tone, [npc.she] explains, [npc.speech(We're continuing to receive reports of criminal activity in this area, #IF(pc.getRace()==RACE_HUMAN) and as you're a human, #ELSE and as you're skulking around in the dark, #ENDIF I'm thinking that there's a good chance that you're the one causing the trouble! Turn around and face the wall so that we can give you a pat-down.)]

#ENDIF

It seems as though these Enforcers aren't going to let you go until they've given you a quick search. You could do as they say and face the wall, or try and resist their demands...

#ELSE

[npc.speech(Oh, it's you again,)] the [npc.race] calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you, before quickly [npc.walking] over with [npc2.name] to stand right in front of you.

#IF(kindEncounter) With a gentle smile on [npc.her] face, [npc.name] explains, [npc.speech(Sorry about this inconvenience, [pc.maam], but we're continuing to receive reports of criminal activity in this area. I can see that you're not the one we're after, but if you've seen any suspicious characters nearby, then details on their whereabouts would be much appreciated.)] #ELSE Throwing you a suspicious glare, [npc.name] puts [npc.her] hand on the baton that's holstered at [npc.her] side, and in a commanding tone, [npc.she] explains, [npc.speech(Sorry about this inconvenience, [pc.maam], but we're continuing to receive reports of criminal activity in this area. I can see that you're not the one we're after, but if you've seen any suspicious characters nearby, then details on their whereabouts would be much appreciated.)] #ENDIF

The one in the lead appears to be [npc.a_fullRace(true)], while the Enforcer who's following in [npc.her] footsteps looks to be [npc2.a_fullRace(true)].

[npc.speech(Stop right there!)] the [npc.race] calls out as [npc.she] catches sight of you. #IF(pc.hasAnyEnforcerStatusEffect()) Confident that your disguise will protect you, you calmly [pc.walk] forward until you're face-to-face with the pair of uniformed officers. #ELSEIF(pc.isBrave() || pc.isConfident()) Not one to be easily intimidated, you ignore what the Enforcer says and continue [pc.walking] forwards until you're face-to-face with the pair of uniformed officers. #ELSEIF(pc.isCowardly()) Scared at the prospect of what might happen if you disobey the Enforcer's order, you do as you're told and remain still as the pair of uniformed officers stride forwards to stand in front of you. #ELSE Not wanting to cause any trouble, you do as the Enforcer says and remain still as the pair of uniformed officers stride forwards to stand in front of you. #ENDIF

Clearly unsure about how to proceed after learning that Lilaya's mansion is your fixed address, [npc2.name] runs off to seek the advice of [npc2.her] superior, leaving you with little else to do but wait in your cell...

Although you expected one of the two Enforcers who arrested you to quickly return, you end up being left alone in your cell for almost an hour. Eventually, however, you hear the sound of footsteps running down the corridor, before a dog-boy Enforcer that you haven't seen before stops outside the door to your cell and breathlessly pants, [style.speechMasculine(Sorry about having left you here for so long; I'll be releasing you right away!)]

With that, the Enforcer produces a set of keys and unlocks the door to your cell, before stepping inside and quickly removing your handcuffs. Once again apologising for how long you've been left in captivity, he asks you to accompany him so that he can lead you out of the Enforcer HQ.

Thankful for this sudden change in fortune, you do as the dog-boy says and allow him to accompany you down the HQ's corridors and out of the front entrance. Curious to know what's caused this sudden change in treatment, you ask the dog-boy why you've been released.

Misinterpreting your question as an accusation of neglect, the dog-boy stammers, [style.speechMasculine(I-I'm so sorry! I only had confirmation that Lilaya had vouched for your release just five minutes ago! I hurried to set you free as soon as I could!)]

With the mystery of your sudden release solved, you allow the dog-boy to hurry off back into the Enforcer HQ, before turning around and preparing to continue on your way...
